channel.title: Code autobanner for spammers
channel.description: Ok first, moderator, dont lock right away, need this, spammers everywhere. I need to know how to code an auto banner, i hate having to close server every 5 mins. Next, please explain in layman's, as i dont know much about coding. So make sure you are very descriptive with where i need to make things. Thanks!
